vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μογῐλάλος [ᾰ], ον,
(μόγις, λαλέω) having an impediment in one's speech, [LXX+NT+2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: impaired of speech, hardly able to talk, speaking with difficulty
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
impaired of speech, hardly able to talk, speaking with difficulty
having an impediment in one's speech, speaking with difficulty, a stammerer, hardly able to speak Mk. 7:32*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: que habla con la voz ronca ; tener dificultad al hablar; mudo
